Method Detail

checkAround

public java.lang.String checkAround(int x,
                                    int y)
Returns string containing ID for each cardinal direction contatining a positive on the scan.

Parameters:
x - x value to check y y value to check
Returns:
a string that represents which came up as true. For instance, if the string is "ur" then Up and Right have monsters.

getAccumulatedDetection

public int getAccumulatedDetection(int row,
                                   int col)
Returns the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object.

Parameters:
row - the row of the location to query for accumulated detections
col - the column of the location to query for accumulated detections
Returns:
the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object

getDetected

public int[][] getDetected()
Returns the location that has been positive the most times/where the monster is detected

Returns:
where the monsters are detected in int[][] form with the first being which monster and the second being the x y postition.

getIsMoving

public boolean getIsMoving()
Returns whether the monster is moving

Returns:
whether the monster is moving

getMonsterLocation

public int[] getMonsterLocation(int num)
Returns location of a monster.

Parameters:
ID - number of which monster you want to get the location for.
Returns:
the location of the monster as a 2-digit array.

returns number of monsters.

Returns the number of scans that have been performed since the radar object was constructed

isDetected

public boolean isDetected(int row,
                          int col)
Returns true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection.

Parameters:
row - the row of the location to query for detection
col - the column of the location to query for detection
Returns:
true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection

scan

public void scan()
Performs a scan of the radar. Noise is injected into the grid and the accumulator is updated.

setMonsterLocation

public void setMonsterLocation(int row,
                               int col,
                               int num)
Sets the location of the monster

Parameters:
row - the row in which the monster is located
col - the column in which the monster is located

setNoiseFraction

public void setNoiseFraction(double fraction)
Sets the probability that a given cell will generate a false detection

Parameters:
fraction - the probability that a given cell will generate a flase detection expressed as a fraction (must be >= 0 and < 1)

setOriginal

public void setOriginal()
Sets the accumulator to reflect the results of the first scan.
